Michelle and Danny get into an argument. Phillip tells Buzz and Harley to simply accept the money for Company. Harley thinks that getting Gus on their side will help them defeat' the Spaulding's. Cassie decides to upgrade the security system at the Beacon. Edmond finds out that Jeffery is no longer working for the feds. Jeffery breaks into Bill's house and is caught by Bill. Bill tells Dinah she needs to leave town. Michelle proposes a deal to Tony about the Lighthouse and turning it into a club/restaurant. Tony and Michelle kiss. Bill and Danny argue over Michelle and the warehouse bomb. Jeffery returns to Bill's house after he leaves and he and Dinah kiss. Edmond and Dinah head over to Bill's house.
